Roadmap

Latest release: DEVON4JS v2.0.0

Main features

  • DEVON4JS assets updated to Angular 6 (as well as for Ionic 3.20.0)
  • DEVON4JS Angular application template updated to Angular 6 with visual improvements and bugfixes.
    More details in https://github.com/oasp/oasp4js-application-template
  • DEVON4JS Ionic application template updated and improved.
    More details in https://github.com/oasp/oasp4js-ionic-application-template
  • PWA enabled
